summary: Want your w8 metro to look nicer?
descriptionHtml:
If you use windows 8 and care about what your metro looks like, this is for you: 
Look here for details on how to customize your tiles (the icons for the apps and programs): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFXpdnv4zz8
http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1899865

All this file includes are the icons that you need for skyrim, nexus mod manager and the creation kit.
author: Luddemann
